title: NAMU Typeface or Hand Drawn?
content:
Hey all, just trying to find out any info on this word mark. Does anyone know if this was ever a typeface? I think the book is from the early 70s.

Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416053822im_/http:/typophile.com/files/namu_4424.jpg)
author: Fostergrant

comments.content:
This looks like it’s based off of Harry Obese:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/harry-obese-rr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416053822/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/harry-obese-rr/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/harry-obese-rr/")
Thanks for that, will have a look.
